Overall, has a very repetitive sense of two different playstyles. Where killing requires significantly more concentration, survivor is somewhat more chill as an experienced player, but is often an M1 simulator if you dont involve yourself with the game much. This repetivity is very clear, but the different survivors you play against all have different playstyles, and the killers have completely different "powers" which can tilt the game at any point. If you want a more relaxing experience to sit down and play something, then it would be better to play survivor. Killer requires endless concentration and intense focus so you need to be in a proper gaming mood.
I would highly recommend this game to someone who needs a time-waster video game and wants to funnel some hours into it in their spare time. It's a good horror for the first 50 hours but loses that factor after you stop taking the game seriously in terms of getting scared. There is a grinding system involved which will take anyone a long time to get anything especially the bare bone amount you earn ingame, but achieving the grind and getting the perks (massive game factor) that you want that will greatly change the way you play. 
It's just amazing and the game I turn on everyday.
This game's very awsome

I am sad to give this game a thumbs down, even though I REALLY fell in love with the concept, but I must say the balancig and the communtity in this game are HORRIBLE.

The game in the begining may seem fun and I for the first 50 hours or so really loved the game, and I thought it was really good, but then I started facing pallet loopers and toxic players more frequently than before.

I feel that the game is just oriented around survivors. Every update makes the killers weaker and the survivors stronger.

But it's not the community and the toxicity and the unbalancedness of the game that makes me furious about all of this. It's the developers, they seem to ignore every negative review and just make the game more unbalanced every update, people have REALLY tried to come up with creative ways to make the game more balanced, while maintaining the core concept, but the devs just ignore it and only listen to the toxic survivor fanbase.

I again REALLY want to like this game, but in its current state I can't recommend it to anyone who wants fair gameplay. This game (even though it has come out almost two years ago) seems just like an early alpha build with much more work to be put into it.

Dead By Daylight is the ultimate horror themed online multiplayer game. The killers ooze with personality while the survivors not so much but I'll go through the important things about the game.


*In case you are wondering "Why only 1.4 hours in a multiplayer game?" The answer is because ultimately, I refunded it. It's a good game, just wasn't for me.*

The graphics are meh, running the game in ultra settings, I found the killers' models shine in the game, everything else looks bland in comparison but the devs may have made it this way to highlight the killers. Maybe also so that anyone could run the game (not sure what engine it runs on but at least you'll know that lag will be a bigger concern than optimization).

Sounds is amazing, everything from the brushing through the cornfields, rambling of the chainsaws, footsteps and other effects create the atmosphere for this brutal af multuplayer game! The music is also on point.

The gameplay is what you'd expect from a match-based multiplayer game which has its rankings reset literally every month. It can be pretty chaotic and/or unbalanced. The game has events every so often which rewards players with cosmetics so that means there is alot of "farming" here where players can cheat the system.

The game is focused on match-ups and not so much skill so if you're a new player, expect to grind, grind, GRIND before you git gud. After all, you're going to need all the perks to be unlocked before you do well against people who actually know what they're doing. You will not win on skill alone, just hope you picked the right perks to help assist your win.

So I thought to myself, should I be a part of this community when I don't have the time to put in hundreds or thousands of hours? I slept on it and refunded it as soon as I woke because I have a belief in which if I can't be 100% committed and excited about a mp game, then I shouldn't be a part of its player base. I don't have the time or energy to put in even a hundred hours in one game so my answer was clear in the final moments.

If you are a horror buff or a multiplayer gamer, you should get this, at least try it. I enjoyed the little I played but my heart wasn't in it. Doesn't change that the game is a great one for the hardcore mp community though. I thought I'd respect the player base and devs enough to write a positive review.
Honestly this game is not that good. But if you download it you won't stop playing. It will just ruin your mood and you will still keep playing for some reason. Just go play Animal Crossing.

Gioco basato su un nascondino horror in cui 4 sopravvissuti devono sfuggire al killer di turno, idea semplice ma nel contesto azzeccata. Il gioco in teoria dovrebbe svolgersi con 4 sopravvissuti che non possono comunicare tra di loro, né via chat testuale, né via chat vocale (tranne che durante il tempo di attesa in lobby), e un killer che deve catturarli e sacrificarli all'entità, ovviamente anche lui non può comunicare con i sopravvissuti (neanche in lobby). E QUI CASCA L'ASINO, nella maggior parte delle volte in cui vi trovate in partita da killer, trovate 4 persone che comunicano tra di loro via Discord/Skype/Teamspeak, e chi più ne ha più ne metta, e si organizzano facendola in barba a quella che è la dinamica del gioco, cioè interpretare i movimenti dei compagni e del killer in maniera tale da fuggire dalla mappa sfruttando quelle che sono le capacità del proprio personaggio. Il gioco così risulta bilanciato interamente dalla parte dei sopravvissuti e ai programmatori sembra andar bene questa cosa. Il gioco a mio parere non ha senso giocarlo da killer in queste circostanze e spero che venga aggiunta una prevenzione al gioco che permetta di non essere giocato in caso di utilizzo di tali applicazioni durante la partita. Non ho intenzione di acquistare nuovi DLC in futuro in quanto implementano nuovi killer (è questo il bello dei DLC) con poteri diversi (anche nuovi sopravvissuti, ma una volta sbloccati i perk diventano tutti uguali) e sinceramente giocare da killer ormai è diventato impossibile da gestire. Buona sopravvivenza a tutti! (visto che tanto giocherete soltanto da sopravvissuti :)

Если смотреть на игру издалека , то она пустая.Но уверяю вас , что если вы зайдете в игру и поиграете за обе стороны, то вы получите дозу веселья и страха.Главное захотеть.Это одна из тех игр , в которой вы можете почувствовать себя героем.
Вы один бегаете , а остальные весят?Нет проблем - спаси всю команду и убегайте.Вы единственный оставшийся? Нет проблем - ползи к выходу.Твой товарищ висит на крюке?Нет проблем - сними,отхиль его и спаси еще одну жизнь.В этой игре нет место ссыкунам.Не сидите без дела.Вы не победите , если будите сидеть на месте.Чините генераторы,спасайте товарищей и будьте евреями(тащите лут из сундуков).Совершая все эти действия, вы довольно прилично злите маньяка.Отбросьте страхи играя в эту игру.А если вы решили пойти на темную сторону , то осваивайте мастерство маньяка.Как правильно вешать людей,убивать и выбешивать их.Почувствуйте всю вашу мощь.В игре интересный сюжет,геймплей,ситуации и локации.И помните: Будьте милосерднее....

ゲームデザイン自体優れていることは認めますが、運営会社のバランス調整能力とアップデートがお粗末過ぎて今後、希望が持てないゲーム。既にサバイバー側のプレイヤー数に対してキラー側のプレイヤー数が圧倒的に足りておらず、時間帯・ランク帯による部分もありますが、サバイバーでのプレイはまともに出来ないと思ったほうがいいです。
少なくとも動画で憧れてキラーをやりたい！と思った人はやるべきではないです。ストレスが溜まるだけ。
サバイバーで脱出したい！と思った人もやるべきではないです。マッチングしないので30分くらいまちぼうけすることになるので。

・運営の不誠実さ
ＤＢＤをプレイしたことが無い人、もしくはサバイバーでしかプレイ経験の無い方はイマイチ、ピンとこないでしょうがここの運営は、サバイバーの強化とキラーの弱体化をこっそり、黙って行います。
非対称性ゲームはバランスを取るのが非常に難しいことは分かりますが、これは余りにも不誠実です。

一年ほどかけて
サバイバー＞＞＞＞＞＞キラー
が
サバイバー＞＞＞キラー
くらいのバランスまで調整は進んでいましたが、その後は、「サバイバーを不利にしてキラーの能力を強くしてバランスを取りました」というアナウンスをしてから、別の箇所でこっそりサバイバー強化、キラー弱体化をするのでいつまで経ってもバランスが取れません。

例を出すと最近ではキラー側から索敵のために重要な足音や声といった音が小さくなり非常に聞こえづらい時期がありました。
多くのキラープレイヤーからおかしいと運営に対して指摘が散々された結果、運営は重い腰をあげ、渋々「こっそりキラーから音を聞こえにくくして不利にするアップデートをしていたのを取り消しました」と発表。その件については釈明もありません。

そして現在もキラー側からサバイバーの痕跡が明らかに見えづらくなる深刻な仕様変更が行われていますが、バグという発表も、仕様を変更したという発表もないまま放置です。

なにより、運営は公式のＱ＆Ａで
Ｑ.キラーが不利すぎてバランスがおかしい。いつになったらまともになるのか
Ａ.運営がバランスを取るなんていつ言ったの？

Ｑ.キラーでやるとストレスが溜まります
Ａ.だったら別のゲームやれば？

という態度なので不誠実さは永久に直らないでしょう。

Perfektní hra. Nahrál jsem na ní přes 1100 hodin a stále mě baví. Určitě bych uvítal nějaké nové věci, itemy apod. Líbilo by se mi, kdyby opravdu něco udělali s těmi campery. Pak by ta hra byla perfektní. :-)) Hrát premade s kamarády je legrace. Za mě palec nahoru.

游戏很好玩，新手不要害怕，前期是恐怖游戏，到了熟练的后期就是竞技娱乐游戏。

实在忍受不了了，更新时可以修复一下链接问题吗？
